meanings.sent1: She is the hippier of the two friends.
meanings.sent2: The hippier outfit stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The hippier hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her hippier style was like a burst of color in a gray world.
meanings.sent5: The hippier decorations transformed the room into a cozy haven.

meanings.definition: One who is more hippy than another
meanings.sent1: He is known as the hippier in our group.
meanings.sent2: The hippier always spreads positivity around.
meanings.sent3: The hippier brought peace and love wherever they went.
meanings.sent4: She was like a hippier from a different era.
meanings.sent5: The hippier's music echoed through the festival grounds.
